Articles.Content:
The way IMGUR albums are displayed in the forums has changed for me, and quite frankly it looks like crap (in my opinion)

Any one know anything about this?

This probably belongs in a different section..

And in that section Kasper made a post about it.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115194-New-Imgur-album-embeds](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115194-New-Imgur-album-embeds)

Imgur is changing the way albums are served. Kasper is working with them to make some changes, which you can read about in [the discussion thread here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115194-New-Imgur-album-embeds).

(Thread closed to avoid duplicate discussions.)
